law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Fruit" means any fruit sold; offered, exposed, packed, or transported for sale; shipped; or presented for intrastate or interstate shipment, except any fruit which is canned, dried, pickled, or frozen.
"Sell" means to sell; offer, or expose, pack, or transport for sale; ship; or present for intrastate or interstate shipment.

"Vegetable" means any vegetable sold; offered, exposed, packed, or transported for sale; shipped; or presented for intrastate or interstate shipment, except any vegetable which is canned, dried, pickled, or frozen.
